item.description:
Hello and Happy Holidays everyone!

When I asked for restaurant suggestions while we were at Akasaka recently, I was surprised to hear how much everyone had liked Tokyo Sushi II. This classic "hole in the wall" restaurant made a big impression on lots of people. Apparently there is something about the "Crazy Roll" that drives one to distraction...and has kept this place in Dawn's thoughts since August. In any case, everyone agreed to make our next meeting there without any hesitation at all.

Hearing this request for a repeat restaurant got me thinking that perhaps we should do a year end poll to pick the "Best of 2009 Middle of CT Sushi Meetup Group Restaurant." I am putting together a poll, and will send another email linking you to that. If you can complete the poll prior to this event, I will announce the results at Tokyo II on Jan. 3rd.

Will it actually BE Tokyo Sushi II? Or another restaurant that you forgot about? Come find out! And ring in the new year with yummy food and fun friends!

See you there!
Kelly

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Happy 2010 and Best of 2009 Sushi !
